Unknown.translation: A frog and lotus flower, a bamboo and sandalwood tree, a crane and a swan, an ordinary stone and a philosopher-stone, nectar and poison may come together, yet do not adopt each other's characteristics.

Unknown.translation: Deer has musk in its naval, a cobra has a pearl in its hood, a bee lives with honey, a sterile woman gets to meet with her husband with love but all in vain.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ieh qwˆ rhI nw iek dUey dy suBwv dI AnjoVqw kwrx lwB nw puj sknw pr Sok ik AYsy BI jIv hn, jo in`q pRwpq vsqU qoˆ BI ApxI AswDqweI kr ky lwB nhIˆ auTwˆdy sgoˆ hrjw pwˆdy hn ijhw ik, ihrx ksqUrI qoˆ lwB nhIˆ auTwˆdw, sgoˆ muridAwˆ nUM ijvwnhwrI qoˆ aultI jwn guvwˆdw hY[ s`p, mxI dy pws huMidAwˆ BI jIvwˆ dw iSkwr rUp Apkwr hI swDdw hY, prMqU idRdr guvwnhwry ies mxky ipCy sÍÎM mOq dw iek idn iSkwr ho jwˆdw hY[ Sihd rUp AMimRq nUM m`KI mwxdI nhIˆ; ikMqU ApxI jwn nUM Kqry ivc pwˆdI hY, AYsy hI bMDÎw iesqRI pqI dy ipAwr qoˆ bMicq krx hwry insPl Bog nUM BogdI hoeI EVk nUM soky dy klyS nwl mrdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: idnkr joiq aulU brKY smY jvwso; Asn bsn jYsy ibRQwvMq rog hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as Sun's light for an owl, rain for a wild herb (javran-alhogi maunosum) and clothes and food for a patient are like disease.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: AYsw hI ijs pRkwr sUrX sB leI cwnxy dw inim`q hY, pRMqU au`lU vwsqy Gor AMDkwr srUp, Aru brKw smwˆ jIv bnspqI mwqR dy pRPuilq krx hwr hY, pRMqU iek jvwˆhy dI brUtI leI sMqwp dw kwrx Aqy ijs qrHwˆ Asn bsn Bojn bsqR Awid ivBUqI sB dy vwsqy suK rUp hY, pr ibRQwvMq rogI purK dI Kwqr rog rUp ruvwn hwrw Jory dw kwrx hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurmiq bIj jmq n kwlr mY; AMkur audoq hoq nwihn ibEg hY [299[

Unknown.translation: Similarly sullied and vice-ridden hearts cannot be fertile to the seeds of Guru's sermons and teachings. It just does not sprout. Such a person remains separated from his God. (299)
